org.nzdis.micro.messaging

Class MTRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.constants.PlatformConstants
      • org.nzdis.micro.messaging.MTRuntime
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MTConnector

    public class MTRuntime
extends PlatformConstants
    MTRuntime is the core Runtime facility on the Message Transport Layer of the micro-agent platform. It manages a wide range of functionality (asynchronous message passing, network (transport and discovery) along with effectively all thread-related concerns.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2013/02/08 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Christopher Frantz

                                               int port,
                                               int timeOutMs)

      • awaitRemoteConnection

        public static void awaitRemoteConnection()
        Awaits one remote connection before returning. Use awaitRemoteConnections() a distinct number of connections should be awaited.

      • awaitRemoteConnections

        public static void awaitRemoteConnections(int numberOfPlatforms)
        Awaits a defined number of network connections before proceedings. This is especially useful in the context of distributed applications to await start until all nodes are connected.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlatforms - - Integer number of platforms to wait for

      • setRandomNumberGeneratorSeed

        public static void setRandomNumberGeneratorSeed(long seed)
        Sets user-defined seed for the random number generator. Should be called before any call randomNoGenerator-related method (such as sendRandomcast() or getRandomNoGenerator()) to ensure reproducible behaviour. However, the seed can be updated at any time and will take effect immediately.
        Parameters:
        seed - Seed for random number generator

      • getRandomNumberGeneratorSeed

        public static java.lang.Long getRandomNumberGeneratorSeed()
        Returns the random number generator seed set for this platform. Only to be called once platform is initialized.
        Returns:

      • getRandomNoGenerator

        public static MersenneTwister getRandomNoGenerator()
        Returns a reference to random number generator instance for arbitrary use.
        Returns:

      • getPlatformID

        public static java.lang.String getPlatformID()
        Returns a unique runtime ID for the platform. Unique for every instance and changing upon every platform (re)initialization.
        Returns:
